name: JNANABHARATHI VIDYAPEETA
briefDescription: Chaitanya Vidyalaya is a rural School in a remote village, Murkwad, in Karnataka run by Jnana Bharati Vidya Peetha, a registered nonprofit Society  of devoted rural women to serve rural children with good education with Worthy Samskar. More than 600 children from nearby 12 villages are studying in LKG to PUC. Most of our parents are Agro-labors & since 3 years there is no rain. Many of them are not able to pay even the least fees of our school. Even though we are not strong enough economically, with the help & encouragement of YOU like people,with keen interest in Education, having heart like an Earth & hands like Clouds, we have adopted 20 poor Boys & Girls from Meghalaya 20 poor Boys & Girls from very backward community of our Dist-Gouli.
